Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice with part of handle root; white slip; interior: glazed black (only minute traces remaining); exterior: traces of black handle root with undetermined surrounding pattern; below, broken maeander pattern between wide bands; below, one wide band above lotus flower and bud frieze.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 49 note 103, p. 234, no. 134)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0188) (phase 2)
